  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="72557" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="72557" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.21</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="1964">1,964</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="229"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Invictus Platinum</b> by <b>Rabanne</b> is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. <b>Invictus Platinum</b> was launched in 2022. Top notes are Absinthe and Grapefruit; middle notes are Mint and Lavender; base notes are Cypress and Patchouli. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about                             <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">116</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Unnecessary and lacks creativity
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                            <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-up"></i>
                                 </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">16</span></div>
                        </div>

                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">129</span></div>

                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Reminds some of car air freshener or Axe body wash
                </div>

        </a>
        <p>by <i>Sandra Raievi Petrovi</i></p>
        <div class="right-bottom-corner-abs">            04/11/22 20:56
                    </div>
    </div>

    <span class="badge">12</span>
</div>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><longevity-rating :perfume_id="72557"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume longevity:<span>3.57</span> out of<span>5</span>.</p></longevity-rating></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><sillage-rating :perfume_id="72557"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume sillage:<span>2.36</span> out of<span>4</span>.</p></sillage-rating></div><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4 -->

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2362991" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2362991" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tcd54"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2170836"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2170836.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tcd54" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2362991ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2362991" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2170836">tcd54</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-27">11/27/24 08:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolute banger. A great mix of bubble gum sweetness that Invictus is know for with an addictive green freshness from the absinthe and mint. Fresh enough for the summer; sweet enough to cut through the cold weather. Performance is incredible, 2 or 3 sprays will last you all day with strong projection for the first few hours. Its great to have a freshie that lasts for so long. I picked up a 50ml for about 35 from beauty base 5 or 6 months ago which was an absolute bargain that I couldnt pass up on. I just smelled this on someone I walked past and was reminded of how great of a scent this is. I cant help myself but smell the atomiser of this every now and then.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2362991"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2362991#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2332602" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2332602" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sandro.agrello"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1037153"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1037153.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sandro.agrello" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bentley/Bentley-For-Men-Black-Edition-55668.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55668.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bentley For Men Black Edition"title="Bentley For Men Black Edition"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2332602ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2332602" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1037153">sandro.agrello</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-30">10/30/24 10:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My Brazilian Review - First Impressions<br />
<br />
Reminds me a lot of Invictus Legend, but less fruity.<br />
<br />
If the fruityness was your problem with that one, this is the go to.<br />
<br />
Very nice take on Invictus DNA.<br />
<br />
Here is not that hot (26 C), so i cant get the nuances. <br />
<br />
Maybe in full summer i'll see the mintyness and other details.<br />
<br />
For the first reason alone, it's an improvemente from Legend. That fruityness requires me a special mindset for wearing it.<br />
<br />
IMHO</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2332602"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2332602#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2327328" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2327328" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mrzoobies"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298804"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mrzoobies" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2327328ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2327328" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298804">Mrzoobies</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-25">10/25/24 10:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample bottle last summer to test it out during school. Needless to say, this is one of my favourite scents. Sure its not mass appealing, but there is something so addicting about the fruity sweet smell. From when I wore it, it lasted all day, and projected fairly well.<br />
<br />
I will say, if you like this fragrance then go check out the bad boy line, very similar.<br />
<br />
Scent: 9/10<br />
Projection 8/10<br />
Longevity 8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2327328"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2327328#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2326377" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2324514" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Viktor_83"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1104004"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Viktor_83" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Y-Eau-de-Toilette-73440.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73440.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Y Eau de Toilette"title="Y Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2324514ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2324514" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1104004">Viktor_83</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-22">10/22/24 23:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's the best Invictus flanker for me (Legend, Victory, Victory Elixir, Parfum),  except Aqua.  Original Invictus edt is the best in line, more bright and interesting, more unique. Invictus Aqua (2018, 2024) is better than edt and Platinum for hot summer, it's more fresh and light. <br />
Platinum is like Valentino Born in Roma edt, CH Bad Boy Cobalt Electrique, but these two are better. Platinum is the same field as Y YSL Line (edt/edp), but all Y fragrances are better. So, Platinum is good, but not interesting for me to buy,  it's reduntant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2324514"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2324514#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

beast mode performance as well, blind buy safe <br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2313044"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2313044#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2311917" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2311917" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="merlotsupernova"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2116873"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2116873.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="merlotsupernova" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Emporio-Armani-Stronger-With-You-Intensely-52802.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52802.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Intensely "title="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Intensely "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2311917ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2311917" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2116873">merlotsupernova</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-11">10/11/24 02:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my favorites from Paco Rabanne, hands downthis ones definitely full-bottle-worthy!<br />
<br />
Think of it as a more "refined" take on Aventus, though its different enough to stand on its own. You still catch a faint echo of that original Aventus DNA, but the real star here is the absinthe (or as the fancy folks say, anise) paired with a sweet, crisp mint note. Its fresh and just a bit playful.<br />
<br />
Now, dont get me wrongI like the OG, but Platinums versatility wins it extra points. You can easily take it from the office to a classy evening out or even a daytime date. While it shines in warmer months, you won't be breaking any fragrance laws by wearing it in autumn!<br />
<br />
Performance? No complaints here. Youre looking at 2-3 hours of solid projection and about 8 hours on the skin (a full day on clothes). Clean, uplifting, mildly sweetthis ones a winner for versatility!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2311917"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2311917#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2301528" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2301528" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Grissom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2228038"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2228038.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Grissom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2301528ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2301528" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2288548" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FreddieB4Life"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1502753"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1502753.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FreddieB4Life" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2288548ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2288548" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1502753">FreddieB4Life</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-19">09/19/24 15:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not sexy at all, and not really clean smelling neither. The best that I can describe it is it can pass for smelling like some type of medicine.It last for a while and good  sillage. It doesnt stink in a bad way , I just feel like this would fit someone 50 and above who has money, but not about that life. Very conservative smelling.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2288548"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2288548#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2286630" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2286630" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Milestone87"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1276861"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Milestone87" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Le-Parfum-61856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Le Parfum"title="Le Male Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2286630ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2286630" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1276861">Milestone87</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-18">09/18/24 01:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Worst Invictus in the line is LEGEND!!! SOUR screechines!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2286630"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2286630#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2286619" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2286619" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheDogfatherHTX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1824841.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheDogfatherHTX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-Neo-93090.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93090.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud for Greatness Neo"title="Oud for Greatness Neo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2286619ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2286619" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841">TheDogfatherHTX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-18">09/18/24 01:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When talking about the Invictus line from Paco Rabbane, most people are going to think Victory, Victory Elixir, Aqua, or maybe the new Parfum. Platinum, however, doesn't seem to get mentioned much. It's also not quite as easy to find as the others. I've seen some people say it's their least favorite in the line, while I've seen others say it's a compliment monster. Not satisfied with this dichotomy I decided it's up to me to make that determination. Let's get into it;<br />
<br />
Scent:<br />
Opening is green, aromatic, and fresh spicy. The primary notes I get are mint, absinthe, lavender, and patchouli. The strongest of the notes are the mint and absinthe. The mint note carries the familiar fresh, spicy, and cooling accord that mint notes are known for. The absinthe is a new note for me, and has a distinct green accord with anise/fennel qualities to it. This is followed by the lavender and patchouli. The lavender is very typical with it's softly spicy and floral aromatic accord, while the patchouli brings a deep earthiness to the base. There's also a bit of grapefruit for some fruity citrus accord, but it takes a backseat to the rest of the notes. The core DNA of the Invictus line is present here, but only in a small dose. The dry down green, fresh spicy, and woody. The primary notes I get are absinthe, mint, patchouli, and cypress. The absinthe and mint carry the same accords from the opening, just dialed back a bit. This is followed by the patchouli and cypress. The patchouli still has some of the earthiness from the opening, but has morphed into more of a sweet patchouli note. The cypress rounds out the dry down with a solid base of woodiness. In the dry down there's a bit more sweetness in the background that is reminiscent of the "bubble-gummy" note found original Invictus, but I'm not sure what note in the official breakdown it's coming from. It could be a mixture of the patchouli and absinthe. Either way, it does a good job of tying in the Invictus DNA to this fragrance.<br />
<br />
Performance:<br />
Initial projection is strong at around 4-6 feet. Sillage is strong as well with an easily noticeable scent trail. After a few hours the projection was about arms length and the scent trail was still noticeable. At the 7 hour mark the projection was the still about arms length but the scent trail was only lightly noticeable. The fragrance lasted somewhere between 8-10 hours before becoming a skin scent.<br />
<br />
When to wear:<br />
This is a perfect spring/summer scent most suitable for daytime wear. It could also work at the office if you go light on the sprays. This wouldn't be my pick for a date night or formal occasions.<br />
<br />
Blind buy:<br />
If you like the core DNA of the Invictus line, or you like green and aromatic fragrances in general, this is a safe blind buy for you.<br />
<br />
Final verdict:<br />
Full disclosure; I have not done a full wearing of the original Invictus. I have sampled it so I am familiar with the scent, but I have not experienced it on my skin from opening to dry down. That being said, it will be hard for me to compare Platinum to the core Invictus DNA. However, on its own it is a great fragrance. I honestly don't understand why this one isn't talked about more or how some can say it's a bad entry in the line. The scent is fresh and invigorating with a bit of sweetness, the performance is respectable, and I got positive attention while wearing it. Unfortunately we're about to head into Autumn where I live, but this will definitely be going into my spring/summer rotation next year.<br />
<br />
Scent: 9/10<br />
Longevity: 8/10<br />
Sillage: 6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2286619"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2286619#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2276241" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2276241" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The whole truth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1801197"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="The whole truth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2276241ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2276241" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1801197">The whole truth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-08">09/08/24 15:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Reminds me of a Sour Gummy Bear + a non sweet dry- Green tea lemonade. This is really interesting &amp; keeps you coming back. Skin May differ <br />
<br />
Immediately reminded me of Amyris Homme by mfk</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2276241"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2276241#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2268379" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2268379" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Biglou88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249102"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Biglou88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2268379ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2268379" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249102">Biglou88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-01">09/01/24 13:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very sour review below and Id say ignore it totally. This is a fantastic all rounder in my opinion thats worth every penny and performance and sillage is 5 star</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2268379"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2268379#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2266350" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2266350" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rxscologne"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2237953"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2237953.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rxscologne" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-Eau-de-Parfum-71606.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71606.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Gi Eau de Parfum"title="Acqua di Gi Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2266350ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2266350" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2237953">Rxscologne</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-30">08/30/24 17:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great attention grabber, sweeter and more citrusy than expected. My favorite fragrance from the invictus line.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2266350"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2266350#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264116" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2264116" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="camp1nhoM"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2162239"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2162239.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="camp1nhoM" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2264116ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2264116" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2162239">camp1nhoM</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-28">08/28/24 16:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I agree that this is similar to CH - BadBoy Cobalt, with the added note of mint, and leans slightly more on the aromatics, which makes it more masculine and grown-up than the CH. It is fresh, sweet and aromatic but doesn't lean on any of them too heavy so is pretty versatile, can use it whenever you want, just adjust the sprays. Performance for me is pretty good, about 6 hours, 1 hour strong projection then good sillage. I would recommend trying BB Cobalt if you like this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2264116"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2264116#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2260454" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Super underrated.<br />
It is strong, very masculine but also fresh and sweet<br />
Fantastically blended.<br />
I agree with the previous comment that people really complement on this fragrance.<br />
I bought a 200ml bottle over a year ago I have 50-70ml left and seriously considering getting a second bottle cause it is discontinued now however still widely available.<br />
<br />
Get it while you still can<br />
You won't regret.<br />
It is long lasting and modern smelling with a huge projection</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2260454"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2260454#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2258824" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
9.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2235152"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2235152#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2234169" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2234169" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Joey_Sillage"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201041"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1201041.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Joey_Sillage" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Imagination-67370.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67370.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Imagination"title="Imagination"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2234169ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2234169" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201041">Joey_Sillage</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-30">07/30/24 17:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me, the best way to describe this fragrance is to say that it sparkles.<br />
<br />
It's very strong, but it is never too cloying. I would call this an invigorating yet seductive fragrance with great longevity. You will catch whiffs and smile. It is one of my favorites of all time, and I have some experience! <br />
<br />
Try this with an open mind if you are hung up on the whole "Invictus basic bro" stereotype. These fragrances are pretty damn good, if I say so myself!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2234169"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2234169#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2233266" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2233266" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TimothyHimothy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2196332"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2196332.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TimothyHimothy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2233266ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2233266" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2196332">TimothyHimothy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-29">07/29/24 20:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a sweet and very casual/generic scent, great for casual events and relaxed environments. It lasts all day, has great projection for the first 3 hours then it tapers off gradually. It does leave a skin scent and it lasts on your clothes even through 1 wash. I understand wearing it in summer for the sugary freshness, however, I'm not a fan of sugary scents in high heat, so I think there are better &amp; cleaner options for the summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2224882" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mothball"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1539654"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1539654.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mothball" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2224882ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2224882" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1539654">Mothball</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-20">07/20/24 22:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the best in the Invictus line. Fresh and uplifting. Not your typical "green" fragrance. Deviates just enough to not be redundant but somehow still manages to stay true to the original DNA. Great for spring/summer/fall. Absinthe note really makes all the difference-you will smell great with a fragrance that has the mass appeal of a "blue" fragrance but without wearing one. Safe for office use (but not my first choice for the office, it's more casual). Great performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2224882"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2224882#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2223464" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Dry down is excelent and it lasts very long . Personally im not a very big fan of the top note but i would be lieing if i said its unpleasant in any sort of way . To sum it up this is an absolute steal for the price and is far too underrated , genuinely timeless masterpiece.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2223464"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2223464#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2222493" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This has become my signature; strong but not overwhelming</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2222000"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2222000#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220345" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I got lots of compliments when I wore it to work the other day. It's just citrusy enough, so all of the notes harmonize very well. This will probably continue to live in my summer fragrance wardrobe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2218813"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2218813#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2217316" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2217316" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragr4nce_world"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2193131"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragr4nce_world" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2217316ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2217316" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2193131">Fragr4nce_world</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-13">07/13/24 05:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I personally love the scent profile as it to me smells like a sweet grapefruit mixed with mint lavender on top. I love it although it can get a bit cloying or headache-inducing. The projection is crazy good as it literally blasts into my nose constantly for the first few hours. The longevity is also quite decent as it will last me a good amount of time (unsure on the exact amount but pretty sure above 6+ hours) I havent really worn this one too much as I personally prefer my warm sweet spicy scents e.g. Le male Le Parfum and swy intensely and it is also winter so I am unsure on the compliment factor as of right now. Overall 8/10 and very very underrated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2217316"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2217316#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215990" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2207567" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eliseoo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757132"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1757132.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eliseoo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Fahrenheit-Le-Parfum-23099.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23099.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fahrenheit Le Parfum"title="Fahrenheit Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2207567ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2207567" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757132">eliseoo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-03">07/03/24 20:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Aside from Victory Elixir, this is the best, true Invictus,<br />
Love at first sniff! It was so good i instantly bought it at macys, however that was stupid and just looked at a few discounters and not all of them for a good price to compare the 200ml at macys.<br />
Anyways, yeah this is the best signature worthy scent I've ever smelled, The mint is just so sexy, the absinthe+lavender+cypress combo to support the mint is just unmatched, dont get much patchouli tbh.<br />
Fresh and clean, perfect amount of sweetness(its not a lot), at the same time being rich and refreshing, this is just amazing.<br />
I know its Invictus, I dont care how many people wear it, its too good to care about that. On top of all of it, performance is above average. If you can find it $70 or below on discounters this is an absolute no-brainer. Definitely test (on skin) before buying, just incase you dont like the way the mint, absinthe, or cypress come across. Though as someone who is on the fence with absinthe in fragrances, this still wowed me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2207567"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2207567#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2197147" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is a bit youthful but is definitely worth it as a dumb reach fragrance. Will last around 7-8 hours and projects pretty well. <br />
Smell: 8/10<br />
Project/sillage:8/10<br />
Value: 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2197147"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2197147#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2196707" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2192116" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="genec123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1721082"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1721082.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="genec123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Antoine-Barrois/Ganymede-54720.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54720.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ganymede"title="Ganymede"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2192116ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2192116" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1721082">genec123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-18">06/18/24 11:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This really is what i classify as a fresh sweet green designer masterpiece.<br />
<br />
I think this is very underrated and perfect for spring and summer, day or night. Sweet and fresh. The sweetness and ambroxan gives this more projection than your average freshie. <br />
<br />
You can find this for 60 bucks on discounters and its totally worth that for a 3.4oz bottle</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2192116"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2192116#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2181928" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2181928" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Imortelle Yo Mama"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2118699"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2118699.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Imortelle Yo Mama" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Enclave-62856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Enclave"title="Enclave"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2181928ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2181928" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2118699">Imortelle Yo Mama</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-08">06/08/24 07:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The absinthe and grass vibes are here. this is a stray from the original for sure, almost a floating green, sweet undertones. Anybody claiming this is better then ANY of the other invictus, are just DYING to be different. While this is more aromatic, it's a green bomb. Not well blended, but it is nice. More of a selfish scent than a crowd pleaser. Almost gives of a plum booze vibe, mixed with greens. Not a safe blind buy, it is more unique then the invictus line, but not something that beats the OG 2015 invictus.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2181928"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2181928#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2177971" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1534965">Imcheap17</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-01">06/01/24 13:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nothing like the og invictus dna whatsoever.. this is a stand alone fragrance. To me its like a combo of CH Cobalt / PDM Kalan. Opens sharp, minty, and somewhat cold and pretty much stays that way the whole way through but gets rounder as it drys. This is a banger. Projection and longevity is perfect.  This stays on clothes for days and gets better everyday. For the money this got to be one of the best bang for your buck. Put this in an MFK bottle and you wouldnt batt an eye..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2174787"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2174787#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2173810" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2160362" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JB11128"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2063261"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="JB11128" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/AXE/Black-29883.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29883.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black"title="Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2160362ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2160362" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2063261">JB11128</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-18">05/18/24 15:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great fragrance and my mom loved this <br />
Its an aromatic slightly green fragrance but super sweet while fresh all at the same time. To me it smells like almost one of those giant gummy bears. Theres a gummy sweetness to this but its not a sticky fragrance like JPG Le male elixir. This is still a fresh fragrance. Not soapy but more aromatic and citrusy, just a tiny bit of a rain water smell in the back.<br />
7 hours longevity, decent silage and projection. <br />
Id give this a solid 7.8/10, I would recommend this for sure especially with a lot of pace rabanne fragrances having very fair prices. <br />
<br />
(atomizer is horrific)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2160362"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2160362#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2151710" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A bit sweet and green. Citrusy opening is top notch. Dry down is the one I love! Great every day versatile scent. Performs really really well get around 8 to 10 hours from this perfume. 9/10 for me! Great job! love the Invictus line never fails me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2151710"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2151710#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2148807" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Imo it's unisex. Longevity and silage out of this world.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2141939"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2141939#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2141521" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2141521" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ixBumb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2028815"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2028815.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ixBumb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Le-Parfum-61856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Le Parfum"title="Le Male Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2141521ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2141521" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2028815">ixBumb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-30">04/30/24 16:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First few times I wore it I got that annoyingly sweet feel but sticking with it grew on me. Not sure what happened but after a while I started getting more of the mint. And the drydown is really nice, have gotten several compliments at work. <br />
Good longevity i can still smell it around 10 hours in, projection was decent for about 5 hours.<br />
08-07-24 update: Am now down to half bottle from how often I use it. And will highly recommend anyone trying it out, or to the people who complain its too sweet. Do about half to a quarter spray at a time, this stops the atomizer from splooging on you and you'll get a fresher feel out of it. Instead of 4 sprays I do 8 half sprays and have no issue in high heat whereas 4 full sprays chokes me out. Hope it helps someone!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2141521"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2141521#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2139303" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
