align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2139303"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2139303#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2138376" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2138376" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NckBlossom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1566746"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1566746.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NckBlossom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Eros-Energy-92647.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92647.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eros Energy"title="Eros Energy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2138376ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2138376" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1566746">NckBlossom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-27">04/27/24 15:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was so conservative of rushing a review about it, so I waited 2 months after I bought it, Im currently sitting on half 100ml bottle and just got a backup one. This might be the best Paco Rabanne frag. Out of my 100+ frags owned over the years Ive changed my Nr 1 spot only a couple of times. This championship cup takes the throne for being a jack of all trades and still making you smell super special on any occasion or latitude. This will make you stand out from the crowd ..or tailed by it.. Hell, I shouldnt even be writing this review.. Erhmm this frag STINKS guys trust me I wouldnt lie to you..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2138376"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2138376#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2131528" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2131528" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gethazte"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947711"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1947711.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gethazte" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Essential-Parfums/Bois-Imperial-64338.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64338.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois Imprial"title="Bois Imprial"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2131528ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2131528" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947711">gethazte</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-21">04/21/24 09:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One thing you need to know about Invictus Platinum is that it is SUPER SWEET. The bubblegum-like sweetness keeps projecting straight to my nose for up to 7+ hours after I put it on, especially on my clothes. In the opening, you get the sweetness; the absinthe note is there but not super boozy or overpowering, and the grapefruit fades quickly. The freshness and spiciness from the mint and green notes blend well together with the sweetness and make for a well-rounded scent. I Put 8+ sprays of this on and haven't choked anybody or caused headaches. It has the Invictus DNA but with the sweetness meter cranked up and earthy/green notes tuned down. It is an upbeat scent, perfect for spring and summer if it is not too hot. Very casual you can wear this basically any day. Less mature than the original Invictus but one of my favorites for spring.<br />
<br />
Score: 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2131528"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2131528#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128645" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2128645" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="KingKaris"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2018665"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2018665.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="KingKaris" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zoologist-Perfumes/Squid-56294.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56294.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Squid"title="Squid"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2128645ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2128645" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2018665">KingKaris</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-18">04/18/24 13:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A well balanced sweet, fresh, spicy. The mint and cypress settle nicely.<br />
A good smell nothing to write home about.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2128645"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2128645#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2124000" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; the price is ok, about 160 cad for 100ml, its not bad but there is better fragrances for cheaper<br />
9/10<br />
i suggest you pick up a sample to try it our for yourself</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2119372"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2119372#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2118502" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2113791" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Milestone87"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1276861"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Milestone87" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Le-Parfum-61856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Le Parfum"title="Le Male Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2113791ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2113791" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1276861">Milestone87</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-04">04/04/24 03:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a good Fragrance and yeah u clearly can smell it is an Invictus Fragrance. BUT!!!! A Youtuber says this is a more mature version of the original and thats completely wrong. First of all the Original Invictus is the most mature version of all of them. Every new release of Fragrances are not really more mature or more masculin they all become an extremely sweet unisex vibe, also this Invictus Platinum. The Original Invictus u clearly can smell the oakmoss, and thats what gave Invictus this kinda old school masculine vibe, even it is a bublegum sweet fragrance. Thats why dont think this perfume is a more mature version, this Platinum has the same sweet vibe like the most new releases like scandal, stronger with u. All new releases of Fragrances are not  masculin enough in my eyes. they all pretty unisex, sugary sweet. Le Male Le Parfum is extremely vanillic sweet but the spices in that Fragrances makes it masculine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2113791"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2113791#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2090338" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2090338" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Luis009"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2054759"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Luis009" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2090338ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2090338" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2054759">Luis009</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-12">03/12/24 11:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Outstanding cologne. It's unique in its own way. It's as versatile as Invictus, but much more unique. Hasn't received a lot of hype, which is good because you get a more unique smell. Performance is incredible despite being a fresh cologne. The smell gets you compliments. It's a bit too strong, so watch out the number of sprays you use, specially in the summer. I love it and women also love it. Smells clean, without being perceived as "water gelly"</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2090338"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2090338#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2088317" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2088317" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Biglou88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249102"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Biglou88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2088317ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2088317" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249102">Biglou88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-10">03/10/24 13:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My word this is absolute monster performer on me anyway. This performs like an edp should do. Well worth every penny in my opinion</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2088317"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2088317#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2084823" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2084823" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vladdarius"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1921690"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="vladdarius" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2084823ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2084823" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2084823"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2084823#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2082674" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2082674" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nihilistgodzillas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1888837"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1888837.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nihilistgodzillas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jimmy-Choo/Jimmy-Choo-Man-Ice-43304.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43304.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jimmy Choo Man Ice"title="Jimmy Choo Man Ice"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2082674ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2082674" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1888837">nihilistgodzillas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-05">03/05/24 01:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the one hyped by the fragcom as the "best Invictus". I'm honestly on the fence with it.<br />
<br />
I enjoy the scent profile but man did they went overboard with the sweetness, it's a little overbearing for what's supposed to be a green herbal frag. The dry down is too heavy, resinous, almost gourmand, so not exactly a freshie for me either. <br />
<br />
Performance is okay, on the lower side for an EDP, others in the line such as Legend perform better on my skin. Definitely try it before you buy it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2082674"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2082674#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2079788" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2079788" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mordrod"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1530898"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mordrod" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2079788ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2079788" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1530898">mordrod</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-02">03/02/24 06:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fruity, synthetic, classic Paco Rabanne thingy, if you are into that. Not saying it is bad. And it is not a boring smell either. The absinthe note(basically star anise) is there, but is not harsh. Overall, a good frag, a bit juvenile though, as usual with PR.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2079788"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2079788#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2074990" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2074990" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SenselessReviews"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307154"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1307154.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SenselessReviews" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2074990ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2074990" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307154">SenselessReviews</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-26">02/26/24 14:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If Gwyneth Paltrow can release a candle called "This Smells Like My Vagina," why can't Jack Black release a cologne called "This Smells Like My Nutbag"? That appears to be the thought process behind "Invictus Platinum," the scrotal-centric creepy uncle of the "Invictus" line.<br />
<br />
The opening of "Platinum" hits you like a surprise "pop!" fart escaping the top of your bumcheeks. It proceeds to ride your olfactory glands like Taylor Swift on Travis Kelce the night of the Super Bowl. Then, before you know it, you are traipsing through cowpies and muttering moon-landing conspiracies to yourself.<br />
<br />
Most disappointing about "Platinum" is the lost potential. It took three years to bring this to market, and for what? It would be like Sylvester Stallone training to be a boxer for eight months and in the end "Rocky" was two hours of him talking about boners. Unworthy of your time!<br />
<br />
Manliness Ranking: Terry Crews snapping David Spade over his knee like a sarcastic piece of kindling</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2074990"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2074990#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2064944" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2064944" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Adz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/572372"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Adz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2064944ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2064944" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); I imagine it would clear your sinuses very well in the winter.<br />
<br />
My least favourite of the Invictus line.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2064944"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2064944#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2059388" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2059388" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Defindo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1698618"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1698618.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Defindo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Emporio-Armani-Stronger-With-You-Intensely-52802.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52802.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Intensely "title="Emporio Armani Stronger With You Intensely "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2059388ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2059388" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1698618">Defindo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-11">02/11/24 17:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I actually really LOVE this fragrance. When I smelled the original Invictus I wasn't a fan but I recently blind-bought Platinum for a good price and I have to say it's great.<br />
<br />
The opening is a blast of absinth which comes off like a sweet mojito, the dry down keeps this smell but gets a little more minty and clean. It's projection is pretty good and so is it's longevity. Definitely a fragrance I'm wearing more often.<br />
<br />
If you like mojitos, green &amp; sweet fragrances then this is definitely for you. I personally love how unique and powerful this scent is, so it's going to be getting a solid 8/10 from me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2059388"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2059388#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2053249" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; minty coupled with some sweetness.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2039208"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2039208#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2038013" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2038013" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Etxrnity"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1974965"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1974965.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Etxrnity" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Beau-Le-Parfum-72158.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72158.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Beau Le Parfum"title="Le Beau Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2038013ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2038013" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1974965">Etxrnity</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-21">01/21/24 20:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This stuff is highly underrated. Very fresh aromatic fragrance. Strong as hell and has amazing performance. I would definitely buy this again<br />
<br />
10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2038013"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2038013#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2035222" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2035222" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="torreykongjr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1541728"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1541728.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="torreykongjr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2035222ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2035222" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1541728">torreykongjr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-18">01/18/24 21:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I guess the absinthe and grapefruit are creating a lasting sparkling sweetness. Its very nice! Similar to its original but better, sweeter cleaner freshier herbal powder. Projects for a while, it does stay within a brush of your bubble for many hours. Sticks to my hoodie for days. My favorite in the line.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2035222"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2035222#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2013756" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2013756" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Luck_fragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1864047"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1864047.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Luck_fragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Le-Parfum-61856.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61856.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Le Parfum"title="Le Male Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2013756ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2013756" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1864047">Luck_fragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-28">12/28/23 21:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean, aromatic, sexy fragrance. Also quite metallic and can definitely smell the grapefruit and lavender in there, good for in the office or school. Has got me many compliments, just about every time I wear it someone asks me what I'm wearing or tells me I smell nice. Overall about an 8/10, great fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="2013756"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=2013756#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1991425" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1991425" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ISmellGood93"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1832728"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1832728.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ISmellGood93" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Layton-39314.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39314.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Layton"title="Layton"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1991425ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1991425" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1832728">ISmellGood93</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-03">12/03/23 11:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Blind bought a bottle, I dig this very much. <br />
<br />
Off the rip, you're met with a very sweet scent, oddly, no one note is sticking right out in my face (and if it is, I can't identify it). Definitely too sweet for me right out of the gate... I get a sweet, but fresh, spicy vibe here, it reminds me a bit of Valentino Born in Roma, maybe a tiny bit YSL Y hanging out in there to my nose. As it dries down, the freshness really starts coming out, leaving a sweetness with it, but it moves towards the back of the scent for me.  <br />
<br />
This makes me think of a more refined mall cologne, like Hollister, or a&amp;f, but in its own way. <br />
<br />
Being 30, I'd say I could definitely wear this, but personally, if I were 40 or older, I'd maybe stay clear of it, it's definitely younger to me. At the same time, still safe for anyone. <br />
<br />
I feel winter wouldn't treat this very good, but I could wear this any season, day or night, and I'd enjoy it.<br />
<br />
Edit 4 months later as Spring has started warming things up, and I've worn this a bit more especially these days, and I believe its had a tiny bit of maceration;<br />
<br />
Still the same vibe, though now I don't find the sweetness overwhelming, but rather very alluring. I get a lot of what I enjoyed in sampling Valentino BiRI, but with much better performance all around. It was a nice 60 or so degree day in my area, and I sprayed this stuff pretty liberally, 12 hours in, and I am still getting nice little wafts off my shirt, and it remains a faint skin scent currently, though I definitely still smell it. Got a couple compliments on it today as well! Good stuff, will definitely enjoy the bottle I have.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1991425"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1991425#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1987925" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1987925" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Child Chemist"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1495263"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1495263.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Child Chemist" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jovoy-Paris/Ambre-Premier-13463.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13463.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ambre Premier"title="Ambre Premier"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1987925ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1987925" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1495263">Child Chemist</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-29">11/29/23 03:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The cypress/conifer note is nice, but I can't stand the heavy use of ambroxan.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1987925"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1987925#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1985525" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1985525" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NoirMemoir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329296"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1329296.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NoirMemoir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Ana-Abiyedh-Leather-82062.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.82062.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ana Abiyedh Leather "title="Ana Abiyedh Leather "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1985525ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1985525" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329296">NoirMemoir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-26">11/26/23 02:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Invictus Platinum shares the sweet and refreshing opening of Paco Rabanne Phantom EDT but instead of lemon it uses the notes of mint and absinthe to achieve this uplifting scent profile. The mint in here is not leafy, not herbal and not natural. Think of the difference between mint flavored soda vs a mojito with actual mint leafs floating in it. <br />
<br />
Paco Rabanne fragrances have this candied sweet, slightly aromatic, bright  lavandery DNA that is very recognisable in their summer perfumes and even the more winter appropriate fragrances such as 1 million share a common sort of DNA. It is a very synthetic sweetness, one i admit i personally find redundant and repetitive becoming. Invictus Platinum's twist is the mint and absinthe notes that provide a cocktail-like fresh and coolness to it that is very appealing. Coupled with the tried and true sweetness, makes it a compliment garnering fragrance. In the drydown, once the opening freshness and vibrancy subsides, the scent moves into the familiar Invictus territory.<br />
<br />
This is also similar to Born in Roma EDT, Bad Boy Cobalt (only in the opening, the truffle note in Cobalt smells weird to me in the drydown) and the other Invictus flankers obviously, but that extra fresh and coldness might make me pick up a bottle in the future.<br />
<br />
Good for the younger crowd, people in their 20's will love this. For anyone with 10 or 15+ fragrances in their collection, this will not be a mind blowing pickup but its still a nice one. I don't usually rate fragrances but i'd give this a 7 / 10. I rate it so because i put myself in the shoes of the average mall customer too, not just an enthusiast.<br />
<br />
Edit: I edited my review because i was rather negative about it at first but as far as the ballpark this fragrance plays in, its a good flanker.<br />
<br />
If i could somehow combine the coolness of Invictus Platinum with the more realistic mint of You or Someone like You then i'd have the perfect 10/10 summer scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1985525"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1985525#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1978791" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1978791" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Theend98"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1473556"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1473556.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Theend98" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1978791ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1978791" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1978613" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Swaraj Sunku"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1592896"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1592896.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Swaraj Sunku" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Elixir-Signature-Scents/Impetus-Elixir-Of-The-Ocean-77715.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.77715.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Impetus - Elixir Of The Ocean"title="Impetus - Elixir Of The Ocean"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1978613ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1978613" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1592896">Swaraj Sunku</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-17">11/17/23 03:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Spicy opening, Good musky drydown. Can smell a lot of Cashmeran in this blended with strong ambers. Long lasting &amp; good value for money overall.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1978613"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1978613#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1978108" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1978108" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Depapi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1660882"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Depapi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-31861.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31861.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sauvage"title="Sauvage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1978108ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1978108" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1660882">Depapi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-16">11/16/23 11:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my favorites. it kind of smells like menthol but i love it and everyone else loves it. I prefer green scents over marine so it works out for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1978108"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1978108#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1977399" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1966116" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mason2192"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1861928"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mason2192" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1966116ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1966116" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1861928">mason2192</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-01">11/01/23 13:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I still have mixed feelings on this one, got a 100ml a few months ago for $65.<br />
<br />
Very sweet and green, I just feel like invictus legend is better. If this came out by itself and I never got my nose on legend then I would feel different, but the grapefruit is 1000x better in that discontinued frag... 6.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1966116"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1966116#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1951404" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1951404" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Siprian85"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1477503"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1477503.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Siprian85" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Million-Gold-95641.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95641.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Million Gold"title="Million Gold"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1951404ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1951404" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1477503">Siprian85</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-13">10/13/23 22:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'd like to commend Paco Rabanne's presentation as<br />
impressive and unquestionably generous with the gifts,<br />
well worth the money paid!<br />
The initial spray has a strong alcohol and minty scent,<br />
presumably from the absinthe note, but it fades quickly.<br />
I don't get much Invictus DNA; it's almost non-existent.<br />
But 20 minutes later, I get this sweet Lavender scent that<br />
makes this scent smell much more mature than the<br />
original Invictus.<br />
After an hour, the sweetness fades and a musky, almost<br />
smoky/woody scent emerges. This fragrance has an 8<br />
hour longevity, but it turns into a skin scent after 3<br />
hours. I sprayed five times total: twice behind each ear,<br />
twice on the chest, and once on the back of my neck.<br />
I noticed that Paco Rabanne's is slowly changing their<br />
fragrances by modernising it with use of the sweet<br />
Vanilla note and the woody Patchouli note in their recent<br />
releases. For example: Phantom, 1 million elixir, Invictus<br />
Victory and now Invictus Platinum.<br />
<br />
Overall Rating (8.5/10)<br />
<br />
Made by PERFUMER<br />
Domitille Michalon Bertier</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1951404"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1951404#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1949769" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1737200">JR 70</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-21">09/21/23 11:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First time smelling this my nose was overwhelmed by its strength and sweetness however after a couple uses it becomes much more bearable and the longevity is incredible along with its versatility for every weather except for cold. Maybe a bit expensive unless a fan of sweet fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1933670"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1933670#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1924966" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1920206" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frankcoelho"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712325"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1712325.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frankcoelho" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/L-Immensite-49751.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49751.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="LImmensit "title="LImmensit "></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1920206ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1920206" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712325">frankcoelho</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-05">09/05/23 07:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Green and sweet powerhouse.<br />
 This is strong! Go easy on the sprays to not suffocate in it. Quite playful and targeted towards younger guys, this is a pleasant and different iteration of Invictus, without smelling anything like it. I say green, but not grassy, just in the way I see this as as spring fragrance, though can be worn anytime except winter (too refreshing and not mysterious enough).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1920206"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1920206#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1919779" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1919779" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MrSpengler"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1415309"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1415309.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MrSpengler" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montblanc/Explorer-52002.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52002.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Explorer"title="Explorer"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1919779ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1919779" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1415309">MrSpengler</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-04">09/04/23 18:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I didn't find the mint... which is strange, being the most voted note, but that aside, it was no particular problem for me. For me, the dominant note is the absinthe, with grapefruit and cypress coming next; as Fortyfree stated below, it's camphorous-armomatic, yet fresh and sweet (not-cloying). <br />
<br />
It reminds me a bit of CH's Bad Boy Le Parfum, but this is much, much better (Bad Boy is, IMHO, too cloying and synthetic, like a bad quality candy).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1919779"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1919779#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1918609" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1918609" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fortyfree"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1631067"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1631067.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fortyfree" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1918609ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1918609" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1631067">Fortyfree</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-03">09/03/23 07:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening is sweet and fresh, slightly aromatic, camphorous. Also has a fruity aroma and is a little "earthy".<br />
<br />
It remains fresh, but with the earthiness increasing. <br />
<br />
Remains sweet, develops a hint of vanilla and a touch of spice. <br />
<br />
Drydown is mineral, salty, earthy, woody and with some patchouli notes. <br />
<br />
It is a modern smelling fragrance which is noticably different from the original Invictus. Would probably be best for spring and autumn. More of a day time fragrance, might be too sweet for formal occasions?<br />
<br />
Performance is good, projection strong and lasts as a skin scent until the next day (on my skin). <br />
<br />
Would suit men ages: 25 - 40.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1918609"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1918609#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1911120" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1905598" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Somwls"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1786329"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1786329.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Somwls" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1905598ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1905598" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); But I saw Platinum on offer, snapped it up and wow do I love it. Instant love at first sniff. Its a fresh, green scent combined with some kind of sweetness, maybe the grapefruit and absinthe. But the combination just amazes me and I dont have anything else like it in my collection.<br />
<br />
This one has amazing projection and longevity for me. It creates a scent bubble that can last hours. Definitely dont get how someone can get weak performance from this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1905598"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1905598#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1892601" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
