padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1888721" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scent of gentleman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1614127"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1614127.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scent of gentleman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ermenegildo-Zegna/Florentine-Iris-16189.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16189.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Florentine Iris"title="Florentine Iris"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1888721ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1888721" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1614127">Scent of gentleman</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-27">07/27/23 23:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Those who say this is bad performance, must have the fake one. This is a Strong performer, stay all day long with 5-6 sprays. Nice scent profile.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1888721"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1888721#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1887099" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1887099" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WizBusiness"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1593758"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WizBusiness" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Solstice-Scents/Astral-Temple-52048.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52048.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Astral Temple"title="Astral Temple"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1887099ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1887099" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1593758">WizBusiness</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-25">07/25/23 20:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this one for the dry down. It's very sweet, it reminds me a lot of Valentino Uomo Born in Roma edt, in general I don't really enjoy wearing it.. but after it's all but faded there's this herbal almost spicy sort of bitter thing going on that I love. If you're into the Paco Rabanne sweetness, this is definitely one of the best in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1887099"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1887099#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1882054" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1882054" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Biglou88"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249102"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Biglou88" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1882054ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1882054" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249102">Biglou88</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-19">07/19/23 06:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Dont listen to the reviewer below, this one has excellent performance and sillage. My mate at work wears it and I can smell him from a mile away so give this a go without hesitation if you like this type of thing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1882054"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1882054#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1879326" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1317633">armando2021</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-15">07/15/23 10:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Damn, it performs extremely well for a summer/ fresh fragrance. Longevity and projection. This is the definition of salty, aquatic,  minty, mouthwatering fresh out of the shower gel scent. First paco robanne cologne in my collection and I love it. </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1879326"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1879326#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1874782" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1874782" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LeatherCouch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1708991"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="LeatherCouch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Issey-Miyake/L-Eau-d-Issey-Pour-Homme-Sport-14185.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14185.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="LEau dIssey Pour Homme Sport"title="LEau dIssey Pour Homme Sport"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1874782ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1874782" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1708991">LeatherCouch</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-09">07/09/23 09:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Despite people below commenting about this not having the salty accord,to my nose,there is there,and also quite prominent. I don't get directly the smell of mint,but the "coolness" vibe of mint is well blended into the composition. Having smelled "Unutamam" by Nishane and natural mint,i know how mint smells like, believe me. So, what's Invictus Platinum? A slightly fruity green-fresh,very salty aquatic (heavy on ambroxan) bubblegum-sweet modern fragrance. It is similar to Bad Boy Cobalt,but the latter has more depth and it isn't as linear as Invictus Platinum. Overall,this is a nice fragrance with good longevity and sillage,but personally i don't love it, because  i'm familiar with that dna and have gone past it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1874782"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1874782#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1873295" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1873295" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="1uckynumb3r"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1091999"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1091999.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="1uckynumb3r" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1873295ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1873295" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1091999">1uckynumb3r</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-07">07/07/23 07:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Seriously? Come on people, it's a trash at this price(80-90 euros/dollars)! I don't understand all that hype. At that price point u can have plenty of better fragrances to choose from in terms of smell and price. So similar with invictus edt and other clones...Just another valentino born in bla bla, dozens of clones, invictus flankers 1-2-3 and so on. Youtube vloggers and many others are appraising this garbage. No. it's not a fresh nor a complex one or a beautifully dark rich type of a scent. I'ts something sweet(not fruitier) in a bad/synthetic way, a kind of aromatic and salty but again in a synthetic style. It's a mess...ok, it has good perfomance but if u want only that from a fragrance u can choose from an oriental brand for less money...<br />
On a scale from 1 to 10 i'll give a 6</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1873295"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1873295#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1866845" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1866845" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Llcj"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1211510"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Llcj" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Sutton-Place-41010.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41010.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sutton Place"title="Sutton Place"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1866845ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1866845" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1211510">Llcj</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-28">06/28/23 19:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really like it.  Smells fantastic, but very similar to the original invictus or born in roma from Valentino.  If you own those no need for this.  Still smells great though</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1866845"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1866845#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1863644" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1863644" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DarthFragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1639884"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1639884.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DarthFragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Sport-Superleggera-95753.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95753.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Sport Superleggera"title="Allure Homme Sport Superleggera"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1863644ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1863644" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1639884">DarthFragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-24">06/24/23 12:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Invictus Platinum is my favorite freshie in the line. Victory Elixir is technically my favorite but it deviates too far from the DNA to be comparable here. For the Invictus freshies, this is the only one that lacks the signature Invictus sea notes. I just dont get along with the sea notes used in Invictus, but like them in other fragrances like the Light Blue and ADG lines. Something about the Invictus sea notes is just a bit off putting to me. Just a bit, I still think they smell great, but not full bottle worthy.<br />
<br />
Platinum on the other hand is stellar. I love fragrances that balance freshness and sweetness and this executes it perfectly. The fresh/sweet combo gives it some added character and distinction, making it more discernible, alluring and easier to pick up in the air. I love the source of the freshness, the green notes of mint and cypress. The absinthe I believe is responsible for most of the sweetness and also adds some additional freshness. This composition is really well blended and I think it far exceeds the other Invictus freshies in both scent and versatility. These green notes are far more timeless than the sea notes.<br />
<br />
Performance is very good, lasting 12+ hours on me with a strong projection and sillage. Its a scent that I never go noseblind to, and never get fatigued by because it smells so good. Other people around me love it too. Its a fragrance that uplifts my mood a bit because I know I smell damn good and I also just enjoy smelling it. <br />
<br />
I know the Invictus line is heavily scrutinized in the fragrance community, but I have no problem saying this is one of the very best fresh designer fragrances on the market.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1863644"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1863644#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1858078" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1858078" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RogueZXRO"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330655"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1330655.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RogueZXRO" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-2020-58714.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58714.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme 2020"title="Dior Homme 2020"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1858078ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1858078" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330655">RogueZXRO</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-16">06/16/23 18:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like cobalt without the earthiness. Long lasting and smells intoxicating. Good for pretty much all year long. Just dont recommend for the office.<br />
<br />
Edit: Platinum lasts all day, gets tons of compliments. Leans a bit younger because of the sweetness but can still be pulled off for the older crowd. I use 4 sprays and that usually Does the trick.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1852065"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1852065#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1849655" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1848853" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nelsongil13"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1030706"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1030706.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nelsongil13" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-Eau-de-Parfum-48100.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48100.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sauvage Eau de Parfum"title="Sauvage Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1848853ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1848853" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1030706">nelsongil13</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-04">06/04/23 10:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>INVICTUS PLATINUM by Paco Rabanne <br />
<br />
PLATINUM is one of those fragrances that you fall in love with from the very first spray: friendly and pleasant.<br />
<br />
I agree that it is similar to INVICTUS LEGEND, removing the salty notes and adding the green ones.<br />
<br />
It is a sweet/fresh scent with steroid: the  performance is outstanding, minimalist and modern. <br />
<br />
A 4x4 Fragrance, Juvenile, suitable for any situation and warm weather. <br />
<br />
Good Flanker!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1848853"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1848853#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1841340" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1832259" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="masongap"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1054997"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1054997.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="masongap" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1832259ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1832259" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1054997">masongap</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-13">05/13/23 13:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very similar to Invictus Legend. Imagine Invictus Legend, taking the marine/salty accords and bayleaf out and adding mint/green elements, you would get Invictus Platinum. It's similar to the Le Male summer flankers where mint is present but a bit more dense. There is also some earthy notes I feel is present that is in Paco Rabanne Phantom. Projection and longevity is about the same as OG Invictus. I don't think it's amazing but might grow on me. Overall, I still like Invictus Aqua and Legend over this one, love the oceanic marine notes on those that this one is missing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1832259"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1832259#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1829552" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1071103">Stevie-boy1965</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-10">05/10/23 09:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lovely modern sweet scent, more leaning to a younger demographic but still suitable for the mature man, especially if young at heart.Guaranteed compliment getter. Dont get the absinth note though, more a fizzy grapefruit on top.....as Borat would say 'very nice!'</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1829552"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1829552#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1826205" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1826205" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Funky_Monk1988"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1591954"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1591954.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Funky_Monk1988" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1826205ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1826205" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1591954">Funky_Monk1988</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-06">05/06/23 06:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Perfect modern daily driver for the warmer days in spring and summer. Office safe; the mint keeps you smelling fresh and people will compliment it. It's not overly unique, but it performs. Good sillage and longevity. A bit more mature than the others in the Invictus line.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1826205"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1826205#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1821133" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Performance is middling. Nowhere near the projection or staying power of Invictus Legend, though that sets a high bar. Day 1 of Platinum is like Day 2 of Legend.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1820077"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1820077#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1816658" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1812112"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1812112#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1809234" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1809234" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sterben9225"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570080"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1570080.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sterben9225" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1809234ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1809234" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570080">Sterben9225</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-14">04/14/23 23:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love the opening. The grapefruit and absinthe are prominent, strong and sweet. On the dry-down its more green with a prominent patchouli note. A little too sweet in my opinion but better than the original Invictus.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1809234"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1809234#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1805289" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1805289" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Einius"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1582444"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Einius" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1805289ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1805289" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1582444">Einius</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-10">04/10/23 09:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening smells like mint gum mixed with some sort of a cocktail, and I like it, but I don't know why, but after 3 hours or so it smells like baccarat rouge 540 on life support.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1805289"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1805289#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1803400" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1803400" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vapor Trail"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1025146"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1025146.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vapor Trail" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Afnan/Tribute-Blue-71174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tribute Blue"title="Tribute Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1803400ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1803400" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1025146">Vapor Trail</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-07">04/07/23 20:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one is all about the top notes. It opens with a huge blast of mint and absinthe that reminds me more of Carolina Herrera 212 VIP Men line than anything else in the Invictus line. It's the freshest and simplest Invictus flanker I've tried, which is not a bad thing to me because the drydown is much less cloying and the overall scent isn't as aggressive. It is still super strong though so this is not one you want to overspray. Longevity is 10+ hours easily and it's an easy compliment getter if that's what you're after. I could see it working great in a club setting during the summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1803400"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1803400#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1801200" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; patchouli, underneath still shares the same fruity mossy ambery DNA of Invictus. They say Absinthe is a dead ringer for licorice, which probably explains Van Gogh's obsession with the alcohol (if you know how much Dutch love their licorice drops).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1791282"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1791282#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1786655" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1786655" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Theend98"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1473556"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1473556.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Theend98" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1786655ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1786655" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); But u cant deny this is a nice grapefruit note. Its not synthetic surprisingly and its got great performance. Overall good release</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1753482"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1753482#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1730698" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1218816">Timyoungn304</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-10">01/10/23 17:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Update: I found a 50 mL for a great price on Mercari and scooped it up. So glad I own this one. The fresh/sweetness is right up my alley. Performance is definitely above average. 3 hours in and still very pronounced on my skin. <br />
<br />
Why so many votes for this being similar to invictus legend? NOTHING alike imo. Idk if this or bad boy cobalt came first, but one company copied the other. Both fantastic scents with great performance. Hoping this one hits a price of about $70 for the 100 mL sooner than later.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1730698"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1730698#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1725715" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I have had the 200ML for almost a year and man does it have projection AND longevity!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1725715"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1725715#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1718194" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1718194" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="K&aelig;tterkat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1529206"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1529206.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="K&aelig;tterkat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Blazing-Mr-Sam-50255.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50255.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Blazing Mr Sam"title="The Blazing Mr Sam"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1718194ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1718194" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1529206">K&aelig;tterkat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-27">12/27/22 04:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells exactly like my room back when I was 13 and I bought a shitton of various Axe deos and gassed my room with them. The sickly synthetic and sweet smell from the combination of various Axe fragrances smells exactly like Invictus Platinum. Juvenile in the worst kind of way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1718194"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1718194#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1714506" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1714506" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Atomikbomb_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1211792"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1211792.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Atomikbomb_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montblanc/Lady-Emblem-31425.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31425.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lady Emblem"title="Lady Emblem"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1714506ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1714506" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1211792">Atomikbomb_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-21">12/21/22 17:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a refreshing fragrance! It's simple, clean, and easy to wear. My husband got a sample of this, and I think it's worth the title of a "dumb reach", because this could probably work in most temperatures and situations. It gets pretty quiet in the cold air though, but the freshness itself is great right now (it's below freezing where we're at). <br />
<br />
As with most PR fragrances, this has a very sweet undertone throughout the entire wear length. On paper, this looks like it *could* be a very brisk, herbal and quite un-sweet composition, but it's a little sugary...as if the whole thing is set within sugar water. Yet, it's decidedly masculine (I think people should wear what they like, this is merely a description). <br />
<br />
The opening is like a can of Squirt soda, it isn't a bitter grapefruit. It's minty, but smells like there's other green things in here as well. Not absinthe necessarily though. The lavender isn't oldschool, it smells more like the modern lavender trend where it tends to be plushier and more akin to lavender ice cream (slightly vanillic). <br />
<br />
It's just clean, sweet and lightly herbal the entire time. I don't think there's anything here we haven't sniffed before (I mainly review female perfumes, but even I feel like I've "been here, done that" with this one) , but it's easy to get along with. It smells similar to the original. Not bad, but forgettable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1714506"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1714506#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1705699" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1705699" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AmoreProfumi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/170873"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.170873.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AmoreProfumi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1705699ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1705699" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/170873">AmoreProfumi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-09">12/09/22 15:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a great alternative to Bad Boy Cobalt.. if you like that but find BB to be a little dirty-earthy smelling sometimes like I do..this is all the fresh and clean smell of Cobalt with very minimal dirty. At first I didnt care much for initial spray I got like a dried toothpastey smell from the mint.. but now thats kinda just dissipated and all I get is cobalt, also as it dries down I get this light sweetness that I love. I may need this as I think its beating out the Cobalt, also easily probably my favorite of the Invictus line, because it stands apart from the usual bubble gum smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1700238"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1700238#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1700233" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1700233" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="yonathanseleshi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1621740"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1621740.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="yonathanseleshi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Luna-Rossa-Black-48682.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48682.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna Rossa Black"title="Luna Rossa Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1700233ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1700233" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1621740">yonathanseleshi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-01">12/01/22 18:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm in love with Invictus Platinum.  Bought a sample and fell in love.  Bought a 1.7 and have worn it a few times.  Projection is great(a good 6 feet).  Longevity is great(7+ hours projecting a few feet). <br />
<br />
This is the best fresh cologne I've used from a longevity and projection standpoint.  The scent hits that fresh, sweet, masculine, warm, inviting profile that's big right now.  I have a good number of these freshies, but I gotta say hands down this is the best performer as freshies tend to be poor performers.  This is also extremely versatile.  Can see someone wearing this day and night and all seasons.<br />
<br />
Wore this today to a sandwich shop next door and got a compliment from someone else picking up their food.  Lol.. verbatim.. "I just gotta tell you...  You got your money's worth with that Burberry".  This person was standing a good 7 feet away from me and picked up my scent.  I only sprayed 2 times on my head and back of my neck 6 hours earlier.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1700233"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1700233#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1696824" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Grapefruit where as Y is a green apple to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1672792"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1672792#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1669530" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1669530" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gxbjw"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251939"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1251939.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gxbjw" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1669530ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1669530" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1251939">gxbjw</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-19">10/19/22 09:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A metallic freshie with green and citric elements to it. Cant help to think this is Paco Rabannes version of Y EDP.<br />
<br />
Invictus Platinum opens very fresh, sweet, and clean. The absinthe helps to balance the scent from being cloying, and so does the citrus. Its smells pretty much the same from the start to the end of longevity.<br />
<br />
I honestly think theres nothing to write home about, but doesnt mean its hard to like. A plus point for its versatility  you can wear it anytime, anywhere, even in the dead of winter.<br />
<br />
The performance is very good. 8 hours of longevity with moderate to strong projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1669530"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1669530#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1664687" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1664687" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TonySpilotro"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1402691"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1402691.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TonySpilotro" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Blue-Jeans-637.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.637.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Blue Jeans"title="Blue Jeans"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1664687ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1664687" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1534965">Imcheap17</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-08">10/08/22 08:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening is very similar to Parfums De Marly Kalan. This is unique, I could see how some people wouldn't like this , but imo this is one of the best Invictus. This stuff lasts and lasts and lasts, starts off a little scratchy, but does smooth out in the dry down. Fruity, spicy, metallic. It's a winner once the price drops</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1661626"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1661626#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1658864" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1658864" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kingderella"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/824317"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.824317.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kingderella" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1658864ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1658864" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/824317">kingderella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-04">10/04/22 11:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The very first impression wasn't too bad. Kinda basic, synthetic, crowd-pleasing, hyper-masculine, sweet-fresh men's fragrance with a metallic edge. Pretty much what you'd expect from an Invictus flanker. <br />
<br />
But then it quickly became rather unpleasant on my skin, it really started bothering me. A kind of sharp, cheap, synthetic scent. <br />
<br />
Performance seems to be pretty decent... I tried to wash it off and it still bugged me all evening.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1658864"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1658864#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1657900" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579178">TeacherOrGamer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-03">10/03/22 05:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this! Tried it in a mall before, it's a love at first sniff  bought it at discounter for cheaper price, for 100ml it's really worth it. Invictus Platinum has quickly become my signature scent. Really good freshie and it's a plus since I am leaning towards fresh perfumes, my country is really hot and humid. Performance is quite good for a freshie, easily 7 hours. Quite versatile too, dress up or dress down no problem in my opinion. I'm already thinking of buying a new one after I finished mine soon. It shows how much I love this perfume since I rarely repurchase perfumes in my collection. 8 out of 10 for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1657900"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1657900#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1657115" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1502826">DJUANGO</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-01">10/01/22 20:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Caught me off guard by surprise! Fresh, clean, bright, and masculine. Not really an Invictus fan, especially, for the OG one. I've worn this two separate times and I am very pleased with the scent. It's something ideal to add to my Freshies collection. Longevity could be better lasted on my skin for about 2-3 hours and then turned into a faint skin scent. Could be worn all year round, but it shines on warm/hot weather. I would rate this a 3.8 out of 5, if it lasted longer it would be a solid 4. Regardless, the scent it self is wonderful and should be added to one's collection for that reason only.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1657115"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1657115#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1656990" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
