Gets better and better on the skin as time goes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1651315"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1651315#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1650873" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1650873" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="marsfragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1575563"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1575563.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="marsfragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1650873ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1650873" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1575563">marsfragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-22">09/22/22 18:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one actually surprised me. On opening it has this aromatic fruity scent that I actually adore. I definitely pick up the grapefruit and I do get a hint of a honeydew. Its sweet, but not cloying, so I think it does much better than the other paco rabanne fragrances. This and Victory have really surprised me, and Ill be wearing them more often. Oh, and longevity and projection is very good as well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1650873"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1650873#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1646315" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1646315" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alexandrehomobono"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1366958"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="alexandrehomobono" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montblanc/Explorer-52002.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52002.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Explorer"title="Explorer"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1646315ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1646315" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1366958">alexandrehomobono</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-16">09/16/22 07:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first I thought it was just another uninspired Invictus flanker. But later that day I fell in love for the drydown. I don't think it's less sweet than the OG, but it's definitely not as cloying (actually not cloying at all). It's green layer gives it depth without making it too dense or deep for everyday use. I like it a lot, not sure will rebuy when the bottle is finished, but it gives me such great vibes when I wear it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1646315"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1646315#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1643941" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1643941"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1643941#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1636463" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1636463" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ashenryn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1455110"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1455110.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ashenryn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Polo-Red-18598.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18598.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Polo Red"title="Polo Red"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1636463ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1636463" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1455110">Ashenryn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-02">09/02/22 06:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Off the top I get the mint and grapefruit extremely strong. There's a hint of the cypress lurking on the edges if you know to look for it, but the average person is going to smell that synthetic mint and juicy grapefruit. The grapefruit isn't a very rhindy or realistic one, but not so synthetic it smells like a cheap candy; it's kind of in the middle. The grapefruit note is what I like the most here, it's pleasant but very strong off the top. More than two sprays gives me a headache. The mint, while synthetic, does blend well with the absinthe and cypress notes to give a very sweet, fresh greenness that stays strong throughout the frag's life. Overall this is pretty good stuff, but it can easily be overwhelming if you don't know to be careful with the sprays. 7.5/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1636463"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1636463#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1634991" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/666509">Samir66</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-30">08/30/22 04:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its a great daily driver, year round people pleaser and an excellent dumb reach. <br />
Platinum could easily be someones signature scent.<br />
<br />
Personally, I really like it. The Mrs. gave it the thumbs up, so that definitely justifies the purchase!  <br />
<br />
Very versatile: Longevity and performance are what youd expect from an Invictus flanker. Great addition to my collection!<br />
<br />
Edit:<br />
After spending more time with Platinum, Id have to say, I absolutely love this fragrance! <br />
<br />
I cant stop sniffing myself throughout the day! <br />
This just works for me. I wear this for me but Platinum always seems to garner unsolicited compliments. <br />
<br />
This is so much a favourite of mine now that I just purchased a 200ml (Paranoid of reformulation).Thats just how much I enjoy wearing Invictus Platinum! <br />
<br />
10/10 </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1634187"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1634187#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1633812" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1627701" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PapaTLooch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1361586"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1361586.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PapaTLooch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1627701ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1627701" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1361586">PapaTLooch</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-20">08/20/22 09:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like something at the car wash, like car air freshener. It's not unpleasant or anything but just reminds me of a typical, blue collar suburban dude who drives a Camaro. Axe body wash. Most Paco frags just smell pedestrian to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1627701"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1627701#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1623530" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1623530" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Laliqua"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1551323"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1551323.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Laliqua" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Edition-Blanche-Eau-de-Parfum-28942.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28942.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Edition Blanche Eau de Parfum"title="Allure Homme Edition Blanche Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1623530ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1623530" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1551323">Laliqua</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-14">08/14/22 10:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Paco Rabanne Invictus Platinum - Fresh version of Invictus, but still so sweet, nothing suprising here. <br />
<br />
Scent: 6/10<br />
Longevity: 6/10<br />
Sillage: 6/10<br />
Bottle: 6.5/10<br />
Value for money: 6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1623530"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1623530#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1618431" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1618431" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="molecularentropy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515005"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1515005.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="molecularentropy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-Tonic-59733.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59733.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wanted Tonic"title="Wanted Tonic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1618431ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1618431" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515005">molecularentropy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-06">08/06/22 17:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Out of all the Invictuses (Invictii?) I've smelled so far, this is the most pleasant to my nose. Interestingly, on a tester strip it smelled less sweet and more green, but on my skin it's the other way around. I'm a candy factory, apparently. Even though this is not really a gourmand, I'd still say it's a little gourmandey. Just a bit. I think that's the absinthe, but I don't have enough experience with actual absinthe to know what that smells like. <br />
<br />
It's not a cool or refreshing fragrance. It's not sporty either. Leans more day-date for me. In fact, that feels to me like the only time I'd wear this. I couldn't wear this to the office, and it's not for night times. They'd kick me out of gym, for sure. Casual day wear? Ehhh ... a little too sweet and "thick" for that. Seriously, a date during a spring day is it for me.<br />
<br />
Let me put it this way. If I were given this as a Christmas present or something, I would not flog it off on eBay. I'd keep it and wear it once in a while. Would I ever get a bottle of this myself? No. But! It's an improvement over Invictus, the OG, I think, which just overwhelmed me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1618431"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1618431#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1616955" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Fresh, green and sweet. Mass appealing scent for sure.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1604630"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1604630#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1600123" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1600123" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="4scentsin1day"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1039029"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1039029.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="4scentsin1day" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1600123ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1600123" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1039029">4scentsin1day</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-10">07/10/22 03:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Masterpiece!<br />
<br />
This ticks the boxes of Versatile, High Performance, mas appeal, High heat day or night Summer Freshie. I will be purchasing a bottle of this as we head towards Summer.<br />
<br />
It's the OG Invictus with the sweetness turned down and the freshness amped up. Easily the best of all the flankers released so far.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1600123"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1600123#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1596466" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1592666" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MildManneredLev"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503288"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1503288.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MildManneredLev" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1592666ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1592666" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1503288">MildManneredLev</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-27">06/27/22 21:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Minty cantaloupe blast. <br />
<br />
The longer it stays on, the more it delves into green territory, the mint comes out and the trademark sweetness of Invictus chills out. And boy does this stuff last a WHILE. CRAZY projection, CRAZY sillage.<br />
<br />
Of all the Invictus flankers, this one stands on its own and takes Invictus to a new place, the others feel similar to each other. If you're bored of the original Invictus, you might like this one a lot, it's a green take on the original DNA</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1592666"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1592666#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1587643" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The opening at first was not my favorite and still isn't but after the dry down, I kept getting whiffs of it and it made me like it more and more.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; It smells nice enough, I suppose. However, there's nothing to make it stand out among the long and growing list of alternatives sharing the same basic DNA that also smell just "nice."</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Excellent longevity and sillage<br />
<br />
Smells good on paper but gross in the air</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1580399"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1580399#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1579773" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1579773" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NoiBoi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/553829"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.553829.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NoiBoi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1579773ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1579773" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/553829">NoiBoi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-07">06/07/22 16:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>You have to look at everything in context. I didnt go into Invictus Platinum expecting a dynamic, complex masterpiece composed by a French master perfumer. Thats not the goal here. That being said<br />
<br />
Im really enjoying this release. Its fresh and uplifting, and perfect for a hot day. Its very modern and has great performance. It serves its purpose as a quality utilitarian fragrance that just plain smells good. <br />
<br />
3/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1579773"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1579773#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1579404" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1579404" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Unmodernize"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/948972"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.948972.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Unmodernize" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Baldessarini/Baldessarini-Black-56762.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56762.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Baldessarini Black"title="Baldessarini Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1579404ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1579404" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/948972">Unmodernize</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-07">06/07/22 06:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hell yeah, best Invictus since OG and aqua! Really glad to see this.<br />
<br />
Its musky clubbing type frag with mint as the hero. Just right amount of sweet balanced with fresh greenery.<br />
<br />
Not too much of the Invictus yuzu dna in here at all and I dont mind. Its in the heart of the sweet notes but this is a modern green masculine scent. This could have been released as a original line. <br />
<br />
Dare I hope the sweet trend is finally over? This is rugged!<br />
<br />
Edit: Funny how mood affects your perception, I went for a followup testing and it is no magic at all. It bothers my nostrils with too much broxan.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1579404"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1579404#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1577333" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I bought  Original bubblegum DNA is in there but dialed waaay back, and has got a real nice woodsy, citrus vibe. This'll be a summer staple for sure.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1577333"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1577333#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1575110" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Next please.<br />
<br />
Edit: HOLD ON... after 4 hours into the drydown... nah just kidding. It's one-dimensional.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1575110"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1575110#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1574307" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Nothing sexy or attractive about it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1574307"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1574307#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1570422" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1570422" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RhettB27"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345688"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1345688.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RhettB27" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/John-Varvatos/Artisan-Pure-46623.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46623.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Artisan Pure"title="Artisan Pure"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1570422ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1570422" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345688">RhettB27</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-24">05/24/22 15:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Initial impressions and after one wear they are pretty different but its apparent this has a lot in common with Bad Boy Cobalt which I love and like what it does a lot more than the Platinum and dont think that will change. Just interesting as the notes arent too similar aside from maybe the notes sharing some similar characteristics but what really connects both is the way the lavender is presented in my opinion. Upon first smelling it I literally thought of Cobalt but as Cobalt gets more earthy and gains some character the Platinum retains a good bit of sweetness and you can definitely sense the cooling mint in the heart which differentiates it. Overall its a pleasant enough fragrance but didnt wow or surprise me much initially and still not exactly crazy about it. If the earlier iterations of Invictus threw you off from the herbal bay/laurel leaf which some people arent fans of, Id recommend trying this one.<br />
<br />
Edit 5/16/23 - not a favorite of mine still but it has grown on me more over time! An undeniably good smelling green, fresh, sweet, and sporty scent with some inviting characteristics that is well suited as an everyday fragrance imho and while there are links to the Bad Boy Cobalt it has differentiated itself a lot more to me over time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; The perfect scent if you want to smell fresh and clean.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1568940"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1568940#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1564742" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; May be my favorite Invictus, I just love the wearability of this and how good it smells.  Some may argue that it may be redundant to own Cobalt and This... However I do notice the subtle differences and for that I'm just happy to own both. Really love this release, alot better than I thought it would be because I'm not the biggest Invictus fan.<br />
<br />
Great release, glad I snagged a 200ml</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1557289"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1557289#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="72557" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>

</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">

<br />
I like it but I do not love it. It feels like Invictus but with a twist to it. To me this is Invictus with a greener and "darker" vibe to it and it's a sort of freshie with a bit of sweetness to it.<br />
<br />
Great when you are going out for that summer party or if you are going out with your friends.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1532723"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1532723#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1600123" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
This ticks the boxes of Versatile, High Performance, mas appeal, High heat day or night Summer Freshie. I will be purchasing a bottle of this as we head towards Summer.<br />
<br />
It's the OG Invictus with the sweetness turned down and the freshness amped up. Easily the best of all the flankers released so far.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1600123"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1600123#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1579773" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1579773" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NoiBoi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/553829"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.553829.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NoiBoi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1579773ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1579773" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/553829">NoiBoi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-07">06/07/22 16:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>You have to look at everything in context. I didnt go into Invictus Platinum expecting a dynamic, complex masterpiece composed by a French master perfumer. Thats not the goal here. That being said<br />
<br />
Im really enjoying this release. Its fresh and uplifting, and perfect for a hot day. Its very modern and has great performance. It serves its purpose as a quality utilitarian fragrance that just plain smells good. <br />
<br />
3/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1579773"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1579773#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="72557" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

Come on people, it's a trash at this price(80-90 euros/dollars)! I don't understand all that hype. At that price point u can have plenty of better fragrances to choose from in terms of smell and price. So similar with invictus edt and other clones...Just another valentino born in bla bla, dozens of clones, invictus flankers 1-2-3 and so on. Youtube vloggers and many others are appraising this garbage. No. it's not a fresh nor a complex one or a beautifully dark rich type of a scent. I'ts something sweet(not fruitier) in a bad/synthetic way, a kind of aromatic and salty but again in a synthetic style. It's a mess...ok, it has good perfomance but if u want only that from a fragrance u can choose from an oriental brand for less money...<br />
On a scale from 1 to 10 i'll give a 6</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1873295"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1873295#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1793689" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Yeah, not for me!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1793689"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1793689#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1557188" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1557188" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="musicformer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1398694"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1398694.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="musicformer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1557188ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1557188" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1398694">musicformer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-04">05/04/22 15:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>After Phantom and 1 Million Elixir the next flanker with almost the same dreadful smell a bit mixed with other components. It's a shame and I don't get this strategy . There was a time I bought all Paco Rabanne releases, that was long ago ...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1557188"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1557188#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1682443" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1682443" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scottgiles86"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1206086"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1206086.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scottgiles86" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Eau-Sauvage-Extreme-2010-72771.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72771.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Sauvage Extreme 2010"title="Eau Sauvage Extreme 2010"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1682443ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1682443" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1206086">scottgiles86</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-06">11/06/22 12:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>50% Y EDP and 50% 1 Million Lucky with a strong opening of bubblegum. Too sweet. Drydown is okay, but the whole thing is very youthful...no way a grown man wanting to be taken seriously would wear this. Better than the original though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="72557"comment_id="1682443"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Platinum-72557.html?ccid=1682443#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="72557" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

                <!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_vrec_1 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x600" id="fragranticacom_perfume_vrec_1" v-pre>
</div>
            </div>
                <div style="clear:both; height: 1rem;"></div>
    
</div>
    </div>
</div>                        <div id="popBrands" class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 4em;"><span>Most Popular Perfumes</span></div>
            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-y grid-margin-x text-center">
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">1.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Khamrah-75805.html" class="en2inter">Khamrah Lattafa Perfumes</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">2.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Elixir-81642.html" class="en2inter">Le Male Elixir Jean Paul Gaultier</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">3.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        confirm_delete: "Do you really want to delete your comment?",

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
